mapper.select: SELECT orderDate, totalPrice, creditCard, expireDate, cardType, userId, discountCost, usedMileage FROM Orders WHERE orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Orders (orderId, orderDate, totalPrice, creditCard, expireDate, cardType, userId, discountCost, usedMileage) VALUES(#{orderId}, #{orderDate}, #{totalPrice}, #{creditCard}, #{expireDate}, #{cardType}, #{userId}, #{discountCost}, #{usedMileage})
